title: Uvais Mohamed assumes duties as CPC Chairman
body_lines: Mohamed Uvais Mohamed has been appointed as the new Chairman of the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC).
He officially assumed duties in the position at the CPC head office today (07).
Uvais Mohamed had previously served as the Chairman and Managing Director of Ceylon Petroleum Storage Terminals Limited (CPSTL).
However, he had stepped down from that position on December 21, 2021.
